attributes.review: I am very disappointed. I downloaded this app to show support to my amazing pig president and when I opened it, I saw nothing but an orange. My cat was with me and when he saw the orange, he fainted as I almost did, him and I both being of color. I panicked and rushed him to the emergency room which caused more of a risk to me and my family as we are in a pandemic. But by the time I got him there, the vet said there was nothing they could do. He passed. This app killed my cat. I‚Äôm deleting it.
